title: Number of Byproduct Coke Ovens Under Construction for United States
notes:
Beginning In 1946, The Term Oven Coke Is Used To Refer To The Solid Material Formerly Called Byproduct Coke Which Is Produced In Vertical Slot-Type Coke Ovens. The Statistics Remain Unchanged. Source: Mineral Resources, 1929, Part Ii, Pp. 582-583; Mineral Yearbook, 1934 And Successive Issues.

This NBER data series a01161 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01161
